Commands.Ray of Hope: Adds 1.2x Krile's Initial BRV to the target.  Grants Elemental Weakness Damage Up to all party members for 3 turns and Small Attack Up for 3 turns to Krile.
Commands.Thunder (V): 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Small Max BRV Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Thunder (V)+: 1-HIT BRV attack and grants Small Max BRV Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Advance All: Slightly raises party Max BRV overflow limit for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Quick Dualcast: 3-HIT AoE Thunder magic BRV+HP Attack executed 3 times  HP damage is split amongst all enemies  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to single target  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV  Inflicts 「Thunder Resist Down」 for 4 turns on the first HP attack  Grants 「Radiance of the Earth Crystal」   「Radiance of the Earth Crystal」 has the following effect:  - Raises party BRV by 10% of total HP damage dealt with 「Quick Dualcast」 for 5 turns (ally and enemy turns)

Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Master Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed after mastering an ability.
Passives.Thunder (V) Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Thunder (V).
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Thunder (V) Charge: Increases the max uses of Thunder (V) by 1.
Passives.Ray of Hope Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Ray of Hope.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Don't die!: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Speed when an ally's BRV is below their Initial BRV.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Moderately raises party Max BRV and Attack while buffed
